Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Requires landlords and lessors provide notice to tenants about bed bug infestation
Summary: Requires landlords and lessors provide notice to tenants about bed bug infestation within twenty-four hours of having knowledge of such infestation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring landlords and lessors provide notice to tenants about bed bug infestation
